targets.query:
from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_Pur"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_Pur"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "COMP"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "COMP"
  )
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_NtA"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_NtA"
  )
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_NET_B"
  )
  |> last()

panels.title: Πίεση Οξυγόνου Δίκτυο B - ΠΡΟΣ ΚΑΤΑΝΑΛΩΣΗ

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Kepware")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "kepware" and
    r._field == "O2_NET_B"
  )
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
